thread.title: Robust construction sector could protect UK from growth downgrade
thread.title_full: Robust construction sector could protect UK from growth downgrade

author: Peter Spence
title: Robust construction sector could protect UK from growth downgrade
text: Robust construction sector could protect UK from growth downgrade A better than expected showing from Britain's builders may offset disappointing industrial health Construction output rose by 0.2pc in the second quarter Photo: Alamy By Peter Spence , Economics Correspondent 11:52AM BST 14 Aug 2015
